Name: Sacred Almanac Traces of Greed
About the game: The mysterious disappearance of a chief engineer Jonathan Finch, interrupts the construction of a trunk railway. Construction company forced to freeze works. The head of the company sends a film footage with records of the accident to his friend, an ex-army officer Richard Stone. Richard's attention rivets one of the tragical moments. He notices the stone monument, and its origin become a riddle for the hero. Having agreed to participate in the investigation, Richard doesn't suspect yet, he takes a dangerous path of a defender of an ancient civilization. Features: 32 Animated and Picturesque Game Scenes More Than 20 Challenging Mini Games The inventory Objects Are Composite and Unique Multipurpose Cane will help you out in tough situations Mysterious Cryptex will be open by founding all crystals Never get lost with our Interactive Map Choose between 3 difficulty modes
